verses.verse: <S%H8085>Hear<s%> the <S%H1697>word<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> <S%H1696>speaks<s%> to you, O <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel.<s%>

<S%H3541>Thus<s%> <S%H559>says<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord,<s%> "Do not <S%H3925>learn<s%> the <S%H1870>way<s%> of the <S%H1471>nations,<s%> And do not be <S%H2865>terrified<s%> by the <S%H226>signs<s%> of the <S%H8064>heavens<s%> <S%H3588>Although<s%> the <S%H1471>nations<s%> are <S%H2865>terrified<s%> by them;

For the <S%H2708>customs<s%> of the <S%H5971>peoples<s%> are <S%H1892>delusion;<s%> <S%H3588>Because<s%> it is <S%H6086>wood<s%> <S%H3772>cut<s%> from the <S%H9194>forest,<s%> The <S%H4639>work<s%> of the <S%H3027>hands<s%> of a <S%H2796>craftsman<s%> with a <S%H4621>cutting<s%> <S%H4621>tool.<s%>

"They <S%H3302>decorate<s%> [it] with <S%H3701>silver<s%> and with <S%H2091>gold;<s%> They <S%H2388>fasten<s%> it with <S%H4548>nails<s%> and with <S%H4717>hammers<s%> So that it will not <S%H6328>totter.<s%>

"Like a <S%H8560>scarecrow<s%> in a <S%H4750>cucumber<s%> <S%H4750>field<s%> are they, And they <S%H3808>cannot<s%> <S%H1696>speak;<s%> They <S%H5375>must<s%> be <S%H5375>carried,<s%> <S%H3588>Because<s%> they <S%H3808>cannot<s%> <S%H6805>walk!<s%> Do not <S%H3372>fear<s%> them, For they can <S%H7489>do<s%> <S%H3808>no<s%> <S%H7489>harm,<s%> <S%H1571>Nor<s%> <S%H369><s%> can they <S%H3190>do<s%> <S%H1571>any<s%> <S%H3190>good.<s%>"
<S%H369>There<s%> is <S%H369>none<s%> <S%H3644>like<s%> Thee, O <S%H3068>Lord;<s%> Thou art <S%H1419>great,<s%> and <S%H1419>great<s%> is Thy <S%H8034>name<s%> in <S%H1369>might.<s%>

<S%H4310>Who<s%> would not <S%H3372>fear<s%> Thee, O <S%H4428>King<s%> of the <S%H1471>nations<s%>? <S%H3588>Indeed<s%> it is Thy <S%H2969>due!<s%> For among <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H2450>wise<s%> <S%H2450>men<s%> of the <S%H1471>nations,<s%> And in <S%H3605>all<s%> their <S%H4438>kingdoms,<s%> <S%H369>There<s%> is <S%H369>none<s%> <S%H3644>like<s%> Thee.
But they are <S%H259>altogether<s%> <S%H9059>stupid<s%> and <S%H3688>foolish<s%> [In their] <S%H4148>discipline<s%> of <S%H1892>delusion<s%> – their idol is <S%H6086>wood!<s%>

<S%H7554>Beaten<s%> <S%H3701>silver<s%> is <S%H935>brought<s%> from <S%H8659>Tarshish,<s%> And <S%H2091>gold<s%> from <S%H210>Uphaz,<s%> The <S%H4639>work<s%> of a <S%H2796>craftsman<s%> and of the <S%H3027>hands<s%> of a <S%H6884>goldsmith;<s%> <S%H8504>Violet<s%> and <S%H713>purple<s%> are their <S%H3830>clothing;<s%> They are <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H4639>work<s%> of <S%H2450>skilled<s%> <S%H2450>men.<s%>

But the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> is the <S%H571>true<s%> <S%H430>God;<s%> He is the <S%H2416>living<s%> <S%H430>God<s%> and the <S%H5769>everlasting<s%> <S%H4428>King.<s%> At His <S%H7110>wrath<s%> the <S%H776>earth<s%> <S%H7493>quakes,<s%> And the <S%H1471>nations<s%> <S%H3808>cannot<s%> <S%H3557>endure<s%> His <S%H2195>indignation.<s%>

<S%H1836>Thus<s%> you shall <S%H560>say<s%> to them, "The <S%H426>gods<s%> that did not <S%H5648>make<s%> the <S%H8065>heavens<s%> and the <S%H778>earth<s%> shall perish from the <S%H7>earth<s%> and from <S%H772>under<s%> the <S%H8460>heavens.<s%>"

[It is] He who <S%H6213>made<s%> the <S%H776>earth<s%> by His <S%H3581>power,<s%> Who <S%H3559>established<s%> the <S%H8398>world<s%> by His <S%H2451>wisdom;<s%> And by His <S%H8394>understanding<s%> He has <S%H5186>stretched<s%> out the <S%H8064>heavens.<s%>

When He <S%H5414>utters<s%> His <S%H6963>voice,<s%> [there is] a <S%H1995>tumult<s%> of <S%H4325>waters<s%> in the <S%H8064>heavens,<s%> And He causes the <S%H9347>clouds<s%> to <S%H5927>ascend<s%> from the <S%H7097>end<s%> of the <S%H776>earth;<s%> He <S%H6213>makes<s%> <S%H1300>lightning<s%> for the <S%H4306>rain,<s%> And <S%H3318>brings<s%> out the <S%H7307>wind<s%> from His <S%H214>storehouses.<s%>

<S%H3605>Every<s%> <S%H120>man<s%> is <S%H9059>stupid,<s%> <S%H4480>devoid<s%> of <S%H1847>knowledge;<s%> <S%H3605>Every<s%> <S%H6884>goldsmith<s%> is <S%H954>put<s%> to <S%H954>shame<s%> by his <S%H6459>idols;<s%> For his <S%H9333>molten<s%> <S%H9333>images<s%> are <S%H8267>deceitful,<s%> And there is <S%H3808>no<s%> <S%H7307>breath<s%> in them.
They are <S%H1892>worthless,<s%> a <S%H4639>work<s%> of <S%H8595>mockery;<s%> In the <S%H6256>time<s%> of their <S%H6486>punishment<s%> they will perish.

The <S%H2506>portion<s%> of <S%H3290>Jacob<s%> is not like <S%H428>these;<s%> For the <S%H3335>Maker<s%> of <S%H3605>all<s%> is He, And <S%H3478>Israel<s%> is the <S%H7626>tribe<s%> of His <S%H5159>inheritance;<s%> The <S%H3068>Lord<s%> of <S%H6635>hosts<s%> is His <S%H8034>name.<s%>
<S%H622>Pick<s%> up your <S%H3666>bundle<s%> from the <S%H776>ground,<s%> You who <S%H3427>dwell<s%> under <S%H4692>siege!<s%>

For <S%H3541>thus<s%> <S%H559>says<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord,<s%> <S%H2009>"Behold,<s%> I am <S%H7049>slinging<s%> out the <S%H3427>inhabitants<s%> of the <S%H776>land<s%> At <S%H384>this<s%> <S%H6471>time,<s%> And will <S%H9503>cause<s%> them <S%H9503>distress,<s%> That they may be <S%H4672>found.<s%>"

<S%H188>Woe<s%> is me, <S%H5921>because<s%> of my <S%H7667>injury!<s%> My <S%H4347>wound<s%> is <S%H2470>incurable.<s%> But I <S%H559>said,<s%> <S%H389>"Truly<s%> <S%H2088>this<s%> is a <S%H2483>sickness,<s%> And I must <S%H5375>bear<s%> it."

My <S%H168>tent<s%> is <S%H7703>destroyed,<s%> And <S%H3605>all<s%> my <S%H4340>ropes<s%> are <S%H5423>broken;<s%> My <S%H1121>sons<s%> have <S%H3318>gone<s%> from me and are <S%H369>no<s%> <S%H369>more.<s%> <S%H369>There<s%> is <S%H369>no<s%> <S%H369>one<s%> to <S%H5186>stretch<s%> out my <S%H168>tent<s%> <S%H5750>again<s%> Or to <S%H6965>set<s%> up my <S%H3407>curtains.<s%>

For the <S%H7462>shepherds<s%> have <S%H9059>become<s%> <S%H9059>stupid<s%> And have not <S%H1875>sought<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord;<s%> <S%H5921>Therefore<s%> <S%H3651><s%> they have not <S%H7919>prospered,<s%> And <S%H3605>all<s%> their <S%H4830>flock<s%> is <S%H6327>scattered.<s%>

The <S%H6963>sound<s%> of a <S%H8052>report!<s%> <S%H2009>Behold,<s%> it <S%H935>comes<s%> – A <S%H1419>great<s%> <S%H7494>commotion<s%> out of the <S%H776>land<s%> of the <S%H6828>north<s%> – To <S%H7760>make<s%> the <S%H5892>cities<s%> of <S%H3063>Judah<s%> A <S%H8077>desolation,<s%> a <S%H4583>haunt<s%> of <S%H8565>jackals.<s%>

I <S%H3045>know,<s%> O <S%H3068>Lord,<s%> that a <S%H376>man<s%>'s <S%H1870>way<s%> is not in <S%H376>himself;<s%> <S%H3808>Nor<s%> is it in a man who <S%H1980>walks<s%> to <S%H3559>direct<s%> his <S%H6806>steps.<s%>
<S%H3256>Correct<s%> me, O <S%H3068>Lord,<s%> but with <S%H4941>justice;<s%> Not with Thine <S%H639>anger,<s%> <S%H6435>lest<s%> Thou <S%H4591>bring<s%> me to <S%H4591>nothing.<s%>

<S%H8210>Pour<s%> out Thy <S%H2534>wrath<s%> on the <S%H1471>nations<s%> that do not <S%H3045>know<s%> Thee, And on the <S%H4940>families<s%> that do not <S%H7121>call<s%> Thy <S%H8034>name;<s%> For they have <S%H398>devoured<s%> <S%H3290>Jacob;<s%> They have <S%H398>devoured<s%> him and <S%H3615>consumed<s%> him, And have <S%H8074>laid<s%> <S%H8074>waste<s%> his <S%H5116>habitation.<s%>
